name: blazecommerce-wp-plugin
description: The official plugin that integrates your site with the Blaze Commerce service.

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-plugin-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-plugin-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-plugin-version
scripts.prepare-release: npm run changelog && npm run build && git add .

author: Blaze Commerce
